name: Shroom?Crawler!
description:
Shroom?Crawler! is a puzzle-oriented Metroidvania. Explore 4 different environments as you search for your way home. Face various challenges, unlock abilities and crawl on walls. 

Controls:

Move: WASD
Jump: Spacebar
Dash: K
Spike: L

If there are performance issues with playing the game in the browser, try the Windows version.

Shroom?Crawler! is made by Alexandru Boaru & Gabriel Moise

Made as an entry for Metroidvania Month 19

Sounds from freesound.org
